info.name: 4chan - Blue Steel
info.additionalInfo:
Sorry for the low quality of the screenshots. 

Sorry again, i had to do a quickfix in order to make it work in chrome and in chrome with 4chan's official chrome extention.

I tried to add some functionality, if you aren't using 4chan-x I added some kind of... quick reply emulation, not big deal, but it looks nice, and it's realy useless since moot added quick reply natively.

Hmmm... It's supposed to work with webkit based browsers too, but I didn't really test it.

The code is kinda redundant, but I didn't tried to remove every little redundance, since I don't come free time.

So yeah, take it or leave it, nothing else to say about it.

Oh yeah, this is based in Sam Hocevar's Minimalistic Mayhem

P.S. moot-kun... could you please unblock my ISP?
